dtliExcerpt: This King and I is almost shockingly beautiful, with Bartlett Sher's direction finding fresh angles on familiar material and Catherine Zuber's costumes creating a visual feast that never overwhelms the story.
bwwExcerpt: ...the revival that opened tonight...is too beautiful to miss...Sher's production is the frankest, and sexiest, I've ever seen. It is also the saddest...The degree to which you want the characters to acknowledge and act on their attraction is a bit of a shock, considering the personal and cultural i...
